articles.title: U.S. skier Mikaela Shiffrin wins record 83rd World Cup race - ESPN
articles.description: American Mikaela Shiffrin's giant slalom win Tuesday in Italy -- her 83rd World Cup victory -- broke a tie on the women's career list with former teammate Lindsey Vonn.
articles.content:
